reviewText:
many people tend to pan this show after ron howard left,and yes some of the latter episodes were not really that good.however i think the final season had some of the series best moments.the two episodes that stand out
WELCOME HOME PT 1 and pt2.richie and ralph come back from the army and many things have changed.very emotional ending. PASSAGE the actual last episode which is a wonderful ending to a fantastic show.season 11 is much better than some of the other seasons without richie and ralph.well worth checking out.
